Package imagingbook.common.color.colorspace

Class XYZ50ColorSpace

  • java.lang.Object
    • java.awt.color.ColorSpace
      • imagingbook.common.color.colorspace.XYZ50ColorSpace
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    DirectD65Conversion, Serializable
    public class XYZ50ColorSpace
extends ColorSpace
implements DirectD65Conversion

    Implementation of a D50-based XYZ color space, as a substitute for Java's built-in standard connection space (obtained with ColorSpace.getInstance(ColorSpace.CS_CIEXYZ)), with improved accuracy. The reference white point of this color space is D50 and any XYZ coordinate passed to fromCIEXYZ(float[]) is assumed to be relative to D50 as well, thus no conversion (color adaptation) is necessary between XYZ values. See Sec. 14.1.1 of [1] for details.

    [1] W. Burger, M.J. Burge, Digital Image Processing – An Algorithmic Introduction, 3rd ed, Springer (2022).

    Version:
    2022/11/14
    See Also:
    XYZ65ColorSpace, Serialized Form
